openstack_keymanager_order_v1.description: Manages a V1 Barbican order resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V1 KeyManager client.

type.description: The type of key to be generated. Must be one of `asymmetric`, `key`.

meta.description: Dictionary containing the order metadata used to generate the order. The structure is described below.

algorithm.description: Algorithm to use for key generation.

bit_length.description: - Bit lenght of key to be generated.

expiration.description: This is a UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. If set, the secret will not be available after this time.

mode.description: The mode to use for key generation.

name.description: The name of the secret set by the user.

payload_content_type.description: The media type for the content of the secrets payload. Must be one of `text/plain`, `text/plain;charset=utf-8`, `text/plain; charset=utf-8`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/pkcs8`.
